name: Microtransaction Simulator Game of the Decade: Deluxe Edition
summary: A game of loss and triumph. Spending money virtually has never been easier. Microtransaction Simulator Game of the Decade: Deluxe Edition takes everything the original game had, makes it 3D, adds more items, adds some recipes, and more. Kick your microtransaction habit by playing a harmless useless clone of AAA games pay-2-win systems.
